title: Are Rare Disorders like Trisomy 13 Appearing More in Babies of Vaccinated Moms?
author: FLCCC

sitename: FLCCC | Front Line COVID-19 Critical Care Alliance
cleaned_text: Dr. James Thorp confirms that he is seeing more rare disorders in babies born to vaccinated mothers, and adds that these chromosomal abnormalities are noted in Pfizer's own data. He notes that in pregnancy, anything that creates inflammation is dangerous, and that the COVID-19 vaccines are highly inflammatory. Dr. Pierre Kory adds that he has never seen a risk to benefit ratio like this, and that as Dr. Paul Marik says, this is the most toxic drug used in history. Dr. Paul Marik says it is astonishing that people continue to be injected with a toxic protein.
